org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting
Interface IPaintVisitor

All Superinterfaces:
IPlugin, Visitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePaintVisitor, ODRPaintVisitor, SimplePaintVisitor, SmoothTilePainter, TilePaintVisitor
public interface IPaintVisitor
extends Visitor, IPlugin

A PaintVisitor is capable of drawing the map.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
